name: Orbits - 3D Touch and Apple Watch Game
name_original: Orbits - 3D Touch and Apple Watch Game
description:
Warning: Addictive gameplay detected!
Orbits is a 3D touch enabled space game for your phone and smart watch.
Space adventure is what you get with Orbits! You need to keep your planet alive by changing its orbit, avoiding stars and planets hurtling towards you! Switch your orbit with a single tap or you'll have a fatal celestial collision!
As time goes by, the game's difficulty increases and it will be an even bigger challenge to get the new high-score.
How long can you survive? Let's find out!
Download Now to enjoy most addictive 3D touch enabled game on your phone and smart watch.

Support and Feedback:

If you have any technical issue please contact us at info@teensystudios.com.
Please include the device information and if possible send a screenshot of the problem.
The more information that you provide to us, the better we can serve you and
fix the bugs that may exist. Thank you.
